code: import React,{useState}from'react';import SubNav from'../../components/common/layout/SubNav';import HRDashboard from'./components/HRDashboard';import HolidayRequests from'./components/holiday/HolidayRequests';import Recruitment from'./components/recruitment/Recruitment';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HR=()=>{const[activeSubTab,setActiveSubTab]=useState('dashboard');const subTabs=[{id:'dashboard',name:'Dashboard'},{id:'holiday',name:'Holiday Requests'},{id:'recruitment',name:'Recruitment'}];const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeSubTab){case'dashboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HRDashboard,{});case'holiday':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HolidayRequests,{});case'recruitment':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Recruitment,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HRDashboard,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Human Resources"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SubNav,{subTabs:subTabs,activeSubTab:activeSubTab,onSubTabChange:setActiveSubTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-8",children:renderContent()})]});};export default HR;
